pageContent:
SANJU SHRESTHA  
      
      deepak@allshore.io | 857-201-0304       
 
 
 
PROFESSIONAL OBJECTIVE:  
Seasoned engineer with expertise in Quality Assurance and a proven ability to transform business ideas 
into effective software solutions. Demonstrates strong communication, analytical, and documentation 
skills while navigating the software development lifecycle. Actively pursuing a challenging position in 
information technology that offers opportunities for advancement and further skill application.  
SUMMARY:  
● 6 years of professional experience in Data Warehousing and Business Intelligence projects in 
Health Care Services, ensuring data integrity and accuracy.  
● Detailed technical knowledge and understanding of Data Warehousing, OLAP, ETL, and BI. ● 
Experience in healthcare data analytics projects, including validating claims, provider data, and 
e-transactions.  
● Knowledge of HIPAA 5010, and experience with EDI 834 Benefits & Enrollment, 837 Claim

e-transactions.  
● Knowledge of HIPAA 5010, and experience with EDI 834 Benefits & Enrollment, 837 Claim 
Processing systems, and 835 Remittance Advice.  
● Proficient in analyzing 999 and 277U files to ensure successful claim transmissions, identify errors, 
and implement corrective actions to improve claim processing efficiency.  
● Experience preparing data-driven reports using Excel, SQL, Tableau, and Power BI.  
● Skilled in data visualization, dashboard creation, and report automation.  
● Understanding of data modeling and business intelligence concepts for actionable insights. ● 
Experience in Quality Assurance and Software Testing of various business applications in 
Client/Server environments, Data Warehousing, and BI Solutions.  
● Proficient in software testing with diversified exposure in Manual and Automation Testing of 
Client/Server, Mobile, and Web-based applications, with a focus on Quality Assurance, Quality 
Control, and meeting corporate Compliance.

Client/Server, Mobile, and Web-based applications, with a focus on Quality Assurance, Quality 
Control, and meeting corporate Compliance.  
● Proficient in developing, executing, and maintaining test cases, test scripts, and performing root 
cause analysis, ensuring thorough testing coverage for software products.  
● Proficiency in Defect management, including Defect creation, modification, tracking, and reporting 
using Industry-standard tools like Azure DevOps, HP ALM, JIRA, and Rally.  
● Strong expertise in test data creation, maintenance, and automation for lower environments. 
● Experience working with Epic System for healthcare data validation and analytics.  
● Skilled in writing complex SQL queries to validate datasets, perform ETL testing, & ensure data 
accuracy.  
● Expertise in data-driven testing and data reconciliation between source and target systems. ● 
Created and managed member enrollment based on account data and processed billing cycles for

● Expertise in data-driven testing and data reconciliation between source and target systems. ● 
Created and managed member enrollment based on account data and processed billing cycles for 
premiums, ensuring accurate deductions and timely payments while maintaining data synchronization 
and compliance in the HealthEdge- HRP system.  
● Strong collaboration, problem-solving, and communication skills, with a track record of delivering 
high-quality project outcomes.  
● Possess excellent communication and interpersonal skills, a team-player and highly dependable, 
with a commitment to meeting program and project demands.

TECHNICAL SKILLS: 
Programming Language  SQL, Python, Base SAS, UNIX, Basic Java, HTML 
Web Service  ReadyAPI, SOAP, Azure 
 
Application Management Tools  Azure DevOps, JIRA, HP-QC / ALM, Rally 
Project Management  Agile (SCRUM), Waterfall 
Databases  Teradata, SQL Server, Oracle 
Environments  Spyder, Eclipse Neon.1, Selenium, GIT, Maven 
BI / Reporting Tool  Power BI, Business Object, Tableau, Advance Excel, SAS 
Client Tool  HealthRules Payor Manager (HRP), TIBCO Foresight, Altruista 
Health-Guiding Care UAT, EPIC system, AETNA member portal, Edifecs 
management system 
Test Documentation  Use Cases, Test Scenarios, Test Cases, Test Scripts, Traceability Matrix, and 
Test Result 
Others  MS Access, Excel, Word, Outlook, PowerPoint, SharePoint, Microsoft 
Planner, Power Apps, Microsoft Forms, Microsoft Teams, Informatica Power 
Centre, Salesforce, Putty 
 
 
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE:  
Client: Blue Cross Blue Shield of Arizona (Remote)

Planner, Power Apps, Microsoft Forms, Microsoft Teams, Informatica Power 
Centre, Salesforce, Putty 
 
 
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE:  
Client: Blue Cross Blue Shield of Arizona (Remote)  
Test Data Coordinator- Quality Assurance • Phoenix, AZ• Jun 2023 – Mar 2025  
Project Name: Commercial Migration/ Enrollment  
Description:  
This project focuses on the seamless migration of multiple Lines of Business (LOBs) and Groups from the 
legacy Metavance system to the HRP platform. The primary objective is to ensure data integrity, 
operational continuity, and alignment with association metrics and strategic goals.  
Responsibilities:  
● Managed and provisioned test data across non-production environments (HRP TEST, HRP UAT, 
HRP PreProd) to support testing and training activities.  
● Coordinated test data delivery for Commercial Migration and other projects, ensuring timely

availability for all testing phases.  
● Ensured data integrity and consistency by managing test data across multiple applications, projects, 
and teams.  
● Handled diverse data formats, including APIs, EDI files (270, 278, 834, 837), and proprietary 
formats for claims, enrollments, and billing.  
● Executed Python-based automation process to enroll various member types for multiple Lines of 
Business (LOBs), utilizing account configurations in the HRP environment to ensure efficient and 
accurate processing.  
● Partnered with Enterprise teams to acquire/provision de-identified test data required for planned 
testing.  
● Coordinated delivery of test data to Commercial Migration and other projects, ensuring timely 
provisioning for all testing phases.  
● Conducted SQL-based validation and backend data analysis for claims processing and migration, 
ensuring data accuracy.  
● Developed and executed SQL queries to validate Claims data integrity and troubleshoot

ensuring data accuracy.  
● Developed and executed SQL queries to validate Claims data integrity and troubleshoot 
discrepancies in Claims processing workflows.  
● Performed configuration testing within HealthRules (HRP), validating benefit and package pricing 
setups across HRP UAT, TEST, and PreProd environments. 
● Generated EDI 837 claims files as per the scenario received, integrated them into Foresight, 
validated, and processed through Edifecs, ensuring successful claims transmission to the HRP 
system.  
● Evaluated, monitored, and ensured the accuracy of claims processing in the Foresight and HRP 
system.  
● Created customized Wipro EDI files to streamline vendor transactions, reducing processing time 
and improving workflow efficiency by ensuring accurate and timely data exchange. ● Reviewed and 
analyzed denied and rejected claims in Foresight and HRP applications to identify the root cause,

and improving workflow efficiency by ensuring accurate and timely data exchange. ● Reviewed and 
analyzed denied and rejected claims in Foresight and HRP applications to identify the root cause, 
determine corrective actions, and ensure proper claim resolution. ● Resubmitted corrected claims in 
Foresight and HRP applications, addressing errors in coding, patient information, and service details 
to ensure timely and accurate reimbursement. ● Resubmitted corrected claims in Foresight and HRP 
applications, addressing errors in coding, patient information, and service details to ensure accuracy 
and facilitate claim approval. ● Validated premium billing processes, ensuring alignment with 
enrollment data and finance policies.  
● Configured and tested provider reimbursements, premium calculations, and payment schedules to 
meet regulatory and business requirements.  
● Analyzed billing discrepancies, identified root causes, and worked with Finance and IT teams to

meet regulatory and business requirements.  
● Analyzed billing discrepancies, identified root causes, and worked with Finance and IT teams to 
implement corrective actions.  
● Ensured proper claims adjudication and financial transactions, validating that pricing rules and 
benefit structures were correctly applied.  
● Ensure that benefit plans are correctly configured and synchronized across the HRP environments.  
● Collaborated with configuration teams to identify and resolve benefit plan configuration issues, 
applying necessary adjustments to ensure accurate system functionality and seamless benefits 
administration.  
● Conducted SQL-based financial data validation, reconciling billing, payments, and claim 
adjustments.  
● Participated in post-testing defect resolution, identifying and addressing inaccuracies in business 
rules affecting claims payment and downstream transactions.

adjustments.  
● Participated in post-testing defect resolution, identifying and addressing inaccuracies in business 
rules affecting claims payment and downstream transactions.  
● Conducted rigorous database testing to ensure data consistency, accuracy, and compliance with test 
data requirements.

● Worked in an Agile environment, utilizing Azure DevOps for test case management and defect 
tracking.  
● Collaborated on automating test data generation and validation workflows using Python and 
Pandas, reducing manual effort by over 500 hours across multiple teams.  
● Contributed to developing and testing a user-facing, self-service application using SQL, and Azure 
to generate compliant test data, ensuring accuracy and reliability.  
● Assisted in building an automated validation framework for 270 & 276 EDI transaction files using 
Python, streamlining testing processes and reducing manual verification time by 75%. ● Identified 
and implemented test data process improvements, enhancing efficiency in data provisioning.  
● Formulated test data backup plans, ensuring timely implementation and proper security. ● Worked 
with Release/Change/Environment Management teams to track and resolve data discrepancies due to 
environment refreshes or downtime.

with Release/Change/Environment Management teams to track and resolve data discrepancies due to 
environment refreshes or downtime.  
● Collaborated with stakeholders (business and technical SMEs) to gather requirements, improve test 
data processes, and support training needs.  
● Attended project meetings, providing crucial updates on project status and deliverables to the test 
data team.  
● Partnered with Test Data Leads to define and enhance the Test Data Management Strategy 
Roadmap. 
● Developed & maintained Power BI dashboards for real-time reporting and performance tracking. ● 
Created visual representations of complex datasets using charts, graphs, and tables, supporting 
strategic decision-making.  
● Undertook special projects as management requested, showcasing leadership and adaptability. ● 
Executed the Test Data Management Strategy Roadmap, consulting with relevant stakeholders for 
improvements and scalability.

Executed the Test Data Management Strategy Roadmap, consulting with relevant stakeholders for 
improvements and scalability.  
Environment: Microsoft SQL Server Management Studio, HealthEdge- HealthRules Payor Manager 
(UAT, TEST, PreProd, Train Env.), Guiding Care UAT, TIBCO Foresight, Edifecs Transaction 
Management, Profisee FastApp Studio, Azure DevOps, Power App, Microsoft Forms, Spyder (Python 
3.11), GitHub (3.4.5), SOAP UI, Power BI, XML, Notepad++, MS Office, One Note  
Client: CVS Pharmacy and Minute Clinic (Remote)  
Sr.Quality Assurance Analyst • Providence, RI • Oct 2021 – Feb 2023  
Project Name: MEP Accordant & Active Health  
Description:  
Active Health is a CVS Caremark company that promotes a well-being solution for all family members, 
which also offers 24/7 mobile and web support as well as live, proactive, individually tailored, 
person-to-person outreach and programming. Active Health engages members, so they get the

which also offers 24/7 mobile and web support as well as live, proactive, individually tailored, 
person-to-person outreach and programming. Active Health engages members, so they get the 
personalized support they need and offers lifestyle support like tobacco cessation and weight management. 
Experienced clinicians support chronic conditions such as diabetes and heart disease and offer innovative, 
specialized case management for high-opportunity areas like chronic kidney disease.  
Responsibilities:  
● Served as a primary contact with business areas to troubleshoot end-user issues and requests, 
providing timely system solutions to ensure a consistent and efficient workflow. ● Assured that 
projects aligned with corporate standards, efficiencies, and resource management to drive successful 
outcomes.

● Collaborated with cross-functional teams, including business analysts, developers, and 
stakeholders, to gather and clarify project requirements.  
● Translated business requirements into testable scenarios and acceptance criteria, ensuring alignment 
with project goals and user expectations.  
● Participated in change review meetings and assessed the testability of change requests (CRs). ● 
Conducted demos for business users and live providers on functionalities within the EPIC system. ● 
Created and documented Test Plans and reviewed them with Business and Integration teams for 
claims and e-transactions related to Providers and Provider Network data.  
● Validated functional, integration, regression, and end-to-end testing across multiple teams. ● 
Performed exploratory testing, covering all key practice areas, including Web API and batch job 
testing.  
● Created test members through the member creation portal, EPIC system, and Ready API for test

testing.  
● Created test members through the member creation portal, EPIC system, and Ready API for test 
validation in different environments.  
● Created and validated patient appointments in EPIC and Aetna patient portals where MyChart is 
activated.  
● Used SQL Developer to connect to data repositories, query tables, and perform data validation, 
including enrollment data and customer identity verification for benefit servicing scenarios and 
security.  
● Logged and managed defects in Jira, attended defect triage meetings, assigned QA tasks for 
re-testing, and updated Jira tasks to complete user stories. 
● Prepared and presented test summary reports to project stakeholders, highlighting testing progress, 
issues, and recommendations for improvement.  
● Communicated with senior management on test execution runs, test cycles, and defects, and 
managed QA code promotions to Integration and UAT environments.

● Communicated with senior management on test execution runs, test cycles, and defects, and 
managed QA code promotions to Integration and UAT environments.  
● Promoted user training for the Production Support team to ensure a smooth transition post-testing. 
● Worked closely with technology staff, including Operations, Developers, DevOps Engineers, 
Product Management, and Product Architecture, to define project scope and deliver services. ● 
Attended Daily Standups for status reporting and collaborated with offshore test coordinators for 
testing updates.  
Environment: Oracle SQL Developer, EPIC, AETNA Member portal, MyChart, READY API/SOAP, Jira, 
XML, Notepad++, MS Office  
Client: Kaiser Permanente  
Quality Assurance Test Analyst • Hillsboro, OR • Jun 2019 – Sep 2021  
Project Name: Risk Adjustment Consolidated Submission Application (RACS)  
Description:  
This project focuses on the development and validation of RACS unified data repository system engine- a

Project Name: Risk Adjustment Consolidated Submission Application (RACS)  
Description:  
This project focuses on the development and validation of RACS unified data repository system engine- a 
central hub for collecting, storing, and submitting error free claims to Centers for Medicaid and Medicare 
Services. ‘Kaiser Permanente’ is building a solution for data submission and operational reporting by 
enhancing the workflow capabilities.  
Responsibilities:  
● Validated different phases of the ETL process, ensuring accurate data extraction, transformation, 
and loading into the data warehouse from multiple feeds.  
● Developed and executed SQL scripts to validate data mappings and transformations across different

stages of ETL workflows.  
● Wrote complex SQL queries to validate Source-to-Target data accuracy.  
● Performed data validation on flat files generated in a UNIX environment using UNIX commands as 
necessary.  
● Involved in error checking and testing of ETL programs using Informatica session logs and 
workflow logs.  
● Mocked up test data when data services for related scenarios were unavailable in the SIT 
environment.  
● Provided test data to the UAT team for UAT validation.  
● Performed functional, integration, smoke, negative, and regression testing to validate correct data 
flow into the enterprise data warehouse.  
● Involved in a migration project, ensuring a smooth transition from the old database to the new 
database.  
● Validated EDI Claims processing according to HIPAA compliance.  
● Experience using Edifecs Encounter Management tool, submitting CSV files to CMS/Edge while 
ensuring comprehensive claim visibility for IT and business users.

● Experience using Edifecs Encounter Management tool, submitting CSV files to CMS/Edge while 
ensuring comprehensive claim visibility for IT and business users.  
● Analyzed and defined testable requirements and created comprehensive test plans aligned with 
project goals.  
● Developed test strategies, objectives, and deliverables based on project specifications. ● Wrote test 
cases against mapping documents, executed test cases, prepared test results, and logged defects in HP 
ALM.  
● Tracked and retested defects after migration to the SIT environment, ensuring defect resolution. 
● Maintained Test Matrix and Requirement Traceability Matrix (RTM). 
● Used JIRA for tracking tasks and user stories.  
● Logged defects and performed retesting, ensuring defect fixes before code migration. 
● Regular coordination with offshore teams for seamless task execution.  
● Actively participated in Agile ceremonies, including daily stand-ups, story reviews, test strategy

● Regular coordination with offshore teams for seamless task execution.  
● Actively participated in Agile ceremonies, including daily stand-ups, story reviews, test strategy 
reviews, test plan reviews, walkthroughs, and retrospectives.  
Environment: SQL Server, Informatica, HP ALM, JIRA Confluence, UNIX, Edifecs Management 
System, XML, Notepad++, MS Office  
Client: Anthem Inc  
Quality Assurance Analyst • Norfolk, VA • Oct 2018 – Mar 2019  
Project Name: GBD Onboarding Checkbook  
Description:  
This project involves the development and validation of the ETL process which brings all regions 
enormous Medicaid and Medicare data on the RDBMS platform and generates various reports to enable 
necessary control and balance systematic audit mechanism.  
Responsibilities:  
● Analyzed various business and system documents, including Business Requirement Documents 
(BRD), Software Design Documents (SDD), Software Requirement Specifications (SRS), and

Responsibilities:  
● Analyzed various business and system documents, including Business Requirement Documents 
(BRD), Software Design Documents (SDD), Software Requirement Specifications (SRS), and 
Functional Requirement Documents (FRD).  
● Well-versed in HIPAA compliance and worked extensively with claims-related data. ● Experience 
with different EDI transactions, such as 837 Submission and 835 Remits. ● Maintained accurate

documentation of claims processing, including submissions, rejections, denials, adjustments, and 
payments for reconciliation and reporting.  
● Collaborated with business teams to gather requirements and translate them into effective 
visualizations and reports.  
● Performed both manual and automation testing and created test cases to track testing results. ● 
Prepared Traceability Matrices to track requirements with test cases, ensuring full test coverage. ● 
Validated all phases of the ETL process, ensuring accurate data extraction, transformation, and 
loading from various data sources into the data warehouse.  
● Validated data from front-end systems to backend databases.  
● Performed Positive, Negative, and Count Validation testing to ensure data accuracy and correctness.  
● Worked with BA, SA, and developers regularly to modify functionality based on testing and 
feedback.  
● Performed back-end testing using SQL procedures and triggers, ensuring data integrity after DML

feedback.  
● Performed back-end testing using SQL procedures and triggers, ensuring data integrity after DML 
operations.  
● Validated ad-hoc and canned reports in Tableau, ensuring accurate representation of data and 
insights.  
● Validated Tableau reports using features like Queries, Slice and Dice, Drill Down, and 
Functions/Formulas to ensure report functionality met user requirements.  
● Validated graphical representations such as Bar charts and Pie charts, ensuring they aligned with 
end-user requirements.  
● Created and optimized data extracts and calculated fields in Tableau, improving dashboard 
performance and data processing efficiency.  
● Conducted advanced data analysis using Tableau, identifying trends and patterns to drive strategic 
decision-making.  
● Participated in SCRUM and SPRINT meetings to align with project goals and deliverables. 
● Assigned critical performance defects to the development team via JIRA, facilitating efficient 
defect resolution.

● Assigned critical performance defects to the development team via JIRA, facilitating efficient 
defect resolution.  
● Participated in daily stand-ups to discuss progress, challenges, and goals with the team. ● Held 
weekly meetings with management to provide status reports, highlighting progress and roadblocks.  
● Tracked defects and progress in JIRA, ensuring timely issue resolution.  
● Assigned critical defects to developers and followed up on their status for re-testing and closure. ● 
Prepared and shared weekly status reports with management, keeping stakeholders informed of 
progress and challenges.  
Environment: Teradata, Tableau, JIRA, Edifecs Management System, Notepad++, XML, MS Office.  
Education  
MBA in Information Technology (Aug 2015 - May 2017)  
Johnson & Wales University, Providence, RI  
Relevant Coursework: Enterprise Data Management, Decision Support System, Current Trends and

MBA in Information Technology (Aug 2015 - May 2017)  
Johnson & Wales University, Providence, RI  
Relevant Coursework: Enterprise Data Management, Decision Support System, Current Trends and
